summary: Medical case management application for veterinary cases with 9 auto-populated fields and voice recording feature
architectural_notes: Voice input format: users speak field name followed by field value (e.g., 'Medical Record Number 12345')
Species and Sex fields use dropdown menus with predefined options
Date fields (Arrival Date, Date of Birth) require intelligent parsing from spoken numbers to date format
known_issues: Voice recording transcription incorrectly populates only Medical Record Number field instead of Quick Fill text box
Parse and Fill button fails to extract and populate any of the 9 case fields

existing_features.title: Fix voice recording to place transcribed text into the Quick Fill text box instead of the Medical Record Number field
Fix Parse and Fill button to accurately extract all 9 case fields from the Quick Fill text box when user speaks field names followed by values (e.g., 'Medical Record Number 12345')
Enhance date parsing to intelligently convert various spoken number sequences into proper MM/DD/YYYY date format for Arrival Date and Date of Birth fields

new_feature_requests.summary: Voice recording with speech-to-text that transcribes to Quick Fill text box
Parse and Fill button to extract data from Quick Fill text box and populate 9 case fields
9 case fields: Medical Record Number, Arrival Date, Pet Name, Owner Last Name, Species (dropdown), Breed, Sex (dropdown), Date of Birth, Presenting Complaint
Smart date parsing to convert number sequences into dates for Arrival Date and Date of Birth fields

projectName: Fix voice recording transcription and Parse and Fill functionality
